about_the_game:
Lumen Inferius plunges you into a world where light and darkness are in perpetual conflict, and a lone warrior rises to restore balance. Trapped in an eerie, otherworldly realm, you must navigate through treacherous landscapes filled with ancient ruins, corrupted creatures, and sinister traps. The line between reality and nightmare blurs with each step, revealing secrets that challenge your perception of good and evil.

This 2D souls-like platformer combines challenging combat with intricate level design. Engage in fast-paced battles, utilizing diverse abilities and solving complex puzzles to survive the dark forces seeking to consume the light. Traverse diverse environments, from haunting forests to decaying castles, uncovering the tragic history of this cursed land and your pivotal role in its salvation or destruction.

Master a variety of weapons and abilities to defeat formidable foes in fluid, fast-paced battles. Navigate a labyrinthine world filled with hidden paths, secret areas, and lore-rich environments. Upgrade your character with unique skills, weapons, and armor to suit your playstyle. Immerse yourself in a dark narrative where every character and setting adds depth to the overarching story. Solve intricate puzzles that require both skill and intellect to progress. Experience a world that changes and reacts to your actions, with dynamic lighting and weather effects enhancing the mood and challenge.

Embark on a journey through Lumen Inferius, where your willpower, strategy, and skill will determine the fate of a world teetering on the edge of eternal darkness.

Inspired by classics of the genre, Lumen Inferius is set to deliver a uniquely haunting and immersive experience that challenges players at every turn.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
